title: Matplotlib Animated Scatter Plot
description: This lab is designed to teach you how to create an animated scatter plot using Python's Matplotlib library. We will cover everything from setting up the plot to saving the animation as a GIF. By the end of this lab, you will have a working animated scatter plot that you can use to visualize your data.

meta.description: Learn how to create an animated scatter plot using Python's Matplotlib library.
meta.keywords: matplotlib, python, data visualization, animation, scatter plot
